bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, uniquely shaped tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 20mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
New CompSet 6061 alloy, cone head bolt, 12-degree, 4-degree shim 31.8mm
Specialized Roubaix Gel wrap w/ neoprene pads
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible, 10-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Roubaix Pro w/ BlackBelt protection, 120 TPI, aramid bead, 700x25c
Specialized Roubaix Pro w/ BlackBelt protection, 120 TPI, aramid bead, 700x25c
Body Geometry Toupé Plus Comp, hollow Cr-Mo rails
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
